mapper.select: select count(0) from mishu.`tb_company` t where t.range like CONCAT('%',#{quaRegex},'%') and t.regis_address=#{regisAddress}
SELECT b.aptitude_uuid AS aptitudeUuid FROM mishu.`tb_company` a JOIN mishu.`tb_company_aptitude` b ON a.`com_id` = b.com_id WHERE a.com_name = #{comName}

SELECT c.phone FROM
mishu.tb_company_info c
mishu.tb_company_info_${source} c
WHERE c.com_name=#{comName}
